Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Levofloxacin (Lvx) (0.008 - 16 μg/mL)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Levofloxacin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing using broth microdilution.
Indications for Use Summary: For determining antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli using levofloxacin.
